PIRA Presentations on the US and World EconomyDear PIRA Client PIRA has created a new presentation on the world economy You can access this presentation via PIRA Online wwwpiracom by logging in and from the Client Home page choosing World Economy from the Macro Data dropdown menu at the top of the screen We have also updated the existing slideshow accessible from the US Economy link The presentation consists of a table and charts that encapsulate GDP and IP performance by countryregion for It is a useful comparative recap for the existing slideshows on the US European and Japanese economies Given the overall importance of economic trends and their impact on regional and global energy markets PIRA maintains databases of key economic indicators to support our analyses of energy fundamentals and the associated market forecasts These presentations which are updated as new data become available are being made available complimentarily to all PIRA Online users If you need a user name and password for PIRA Online or if you need help logging in please contact Dyana Rothman at email If you are having trouble finding the Macro Data link go to the FAQ page on PIRA Online and click on question number Gary N Ross Chief Executive Officer PIRA Energy Group

PIRA Presentation on the US EconomyDear PIRA Client PIRA has created a new slide presentation on the US economy You can access this presentation via PIRA Online wwwpiracom by logging in and choosing US Economy from the new Macro Data dropdown menu at the top of the screen The table of contents is listed below Given the overall importance of US economic trends and their impact on local and international energy markets PIRA maintains and analyzes a database of key economic indicators This effort supports our ongoing analyses of energy supplydemand fundamentals and the associated market forecasts This slide presentation which will be updated as new data become available is being made available complimentarily to all PIRA clients to support their own analyses Gary N Ross Chief Executive Officer PIRA Energy Group If you need a user name and password for PIRA Online or if you need help logging in please contact John Graziano at email ANATOMY OF THE US ECONOMY SLIDE SHOW OF KEY FACTORS DRIVING US ECONOMIC GROWTH JUNE Summary US Real GDP Growth US Economy At Glance US GDP Statistics Billions Consumer Sector SP Stock Price Performance As Of April Retail Sales Service PIRAs Weekly Refinery Margin ChartsDear Global Oil Retainer Client PIRA is expanding its weekly assessment of global refining profitability to include Mediterranean and Singapore refining regions key additions to those already provided on a weekly basis which include cracking for WTI crude in the US Gulf Chicago and Group cracking for LLS crude in the US Gulf and cracking and hydroskimming for Brent crude in NW Europe These margins are based on PIRAs proprietary crude yields and represent industry or swing refinery margins The added margins are cracking and hydroskimming for Urals crude in the Mediterranean and cracking and topping margins for Dubai crude in Singapore The Bbl margins represent incremental cash operating margins which equal gross product worth less delivered crude cost less variable refining operating costs Margins are calculated and plotted for each day that prices are available PIRA will continue to publish margin charts every Monday afternoon at wwwpiracom Look for further announcements in the future as PIRA continues to enhance worldwide refining information for its Retainer Clients including margin analysis in other key refining regions PIRA Energy Group

PIRA Seminar Material on PIRA OnlineDear PIRA Retainer Client To those of you who attended last weeks Annual Retainer Client Seminar thank you for making the trip to New York and for helping us make the Seminar an unqualified success I think PIRA consultants and clients alike were reassured by the robust turnout and the overall enthusiasm that accompanied the event As a further service to you as well as to those clients who could not attend in person please note that the Seminar material data tables and slide presentations is available to you in electronic format via PIRA Online The direct link is seminarseminarhtm By endweek we intend for the audio portion of the presentations to also be available online I look forward to seeing you at next years seminar tentatively scheduled for Oct if not sooner during my travels Sincerely Gary N Ross Chief Executive Officer PIRA Energy Group

PIRA Launches European Electricity Servicepst Dear PIRA Retainer Client European electricity markets are experiencing an unprecedented surge in trading volumes and will be entering new phases of integration and liberalization in the years to come As barriers to trade rapidly erode among countries and regional markets emerge we are witnessing all forms of change in pricing basis and new areas of power trade are constantly evolving With these changes in mind PIRA Energy Group announces the launching of its new European Electricity Service EES ClientServicesEEShtm an Internetbased Retainer Service that complements PIRAs existing market coverage of European and North American natural gas North American power and global oil EES provides clients with a robust data base including detailed information for over power plants as well as market insights into the developments of power generation demand crossborder trading and prices PIRAs reputation for grasping market fundamentals is unrivaled and EES continues in that tradition by helping clients to analyze how to capture value in the rapidly changing European electricity market Clients of EES will benefit from Analysis of major and subtle shifts in market trends which will impact supply availability power demand crossborder trading and price direction Opportunities to dig deeply into the rich EES database and reveal key issues influencing both short and longterm market fundamentals Integration of PIRAs unparalleled reputation for gas and oil forecasting in addressing interfuel competition and arbitrage opportunities in the European market The attached prospectus provides more information about EES or you can go to our website at ClientServicesEEShtm Please take some time to review the material and contact me to discuss the service or to sign up for an online trial of EES PLEASE NOTE Current PIRA European Natural Gas ENG Clients can realize significant discounts when adding EES to their existing ENG Retainer Service If you have any further questions please do not hesitate to contact me Regards AJ Conley Managing Director Client Services PIRA Energy Group mailto

PIRA Seminar Material on PIRA OnlineDear PIRA Retainer Client To those of you who attended last weeks Annual Retainer Client Seminar thank you for making the trip to New York and for helping us make the Seminar an unqualified success I think PIRA consultants and clients alike were reassured by the robust turnout and the overall enthusiasm that accompanied the event As a further service to you as well as to those clients who could not attend in person please note that the Seminar material data tables and slide presentations is available to you in electronic format via PIRA Online The direct link is seminarseminarhtm By endweek we intend for the audio portion of the presentations to also be available online I look forward to seeing you at next years seminar tentatively scheduled for Oct if not sooner during my travels Sincerely Gary N Ross Chief Executive Officer PIRA Energy Group

PIRAs Weekly Refinery Margin ChartsDear Global Oil Retainer Client PIRA is expanding its weekly assessment of global refining profitability to include Mediterranean and Singapore refining regions key additions to those already provided on a weekly basis which include cracking for WTI crude in the US Gulf Chicago and Group cracking for LLS crude in the US Gulf and cracking and hydroskimming for Brent crude in NW Europe These margins are based on PIRAs proprietary crude yields and represent industry or swing refinery margins The added margins are cracking and hydroskimming for Urals crude in the Mediterranean and cracking and topping margins for Dubai crude in Singapore The Bbl margins represent incremental cash operating margins which equal gross product worth less delivered crude cost less variable refining operating costs Margins are calculated and plotted for each day that prices are available PIRA will continue to publish margin charts every Monday afternoon at wwwpiracom Look for further announcements in the future as PIRA continues to enhance worldwide refining information for its Retainer Clients including margin analysis in other key refining regions PIRA Energy Group
